publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Certificate of Stock] 1850 July 1 [in the] Adelphi Theatre Company
bibl.note: This document is a certificate for four shares of stock, dated July 1, 1850, in the Adelphi Theatre Company in Nashville, Tennessee, and was purchased by Frederic Sloan. The certificate was donated to the Tennessee Historical Society in 1969 by Mr. Sloan's great niece, Jeannette Sloan.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.head: ADELPHI THEATRE COMPANY
SharesNo.
div.p: This is to Certify, that Frederic Sloan is owner of Four SHARES OF STOCK in the ADELPHI THEATRE COMPANY, at Nashville, incorporated in 1850. Shares $25 each, paid in full, and transferable on the Books of the Company.
In Testimony Whereof, It is Ordered by the Board of Directors, that the Seal of the Company be hereunto affixed, and the signature of the President be subscribed. This first day of July 1850
div.closer:
M. N. Brown
President
A. S. Sangley Secretary
Seal on left side of certificate
CERTIFICATE OF STOCK
